articles.title: EU approves Novavax shot as fifth COVID vaccine - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency paves the way for a fifth authorised COVID jab in the bloc, approving its use in adults.
articles.content: The European Union has approved the use of Novavaxs COVID-19 vaccine in people 18 years and older, giving a boost to the US biotech after long delays and paving the way for a fifth shot in the EU as … [+4090 chars]

articles.title: As omicron surges, nations announce rules on gatherings and travel ahead of holidays - NPR
articles.description: European nations implemented a wave of new restrictions as case numbers rise. And Israel added the U.S. and Canada to its "red list" of countries from which citizens are barred from travel.
